EmailTemplate.subject: Now that PosgresConf is behind us, what’s next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for connecting with us at PostgresConf! Whether you attended Greenplum Summit sessions or had a chat with our team in the Pivotal booth, we trust you now know a little (or a lot!) more about the “Massively Parallel Postgres” in Greenplum. Download Greenplum today <[[https://greenplum.org/download/]]> or check it out in your favorite cloud marketplace and start leveraging powerful, rapid analytics on petabyte scale data volumes.
Want to learn even more?
We invite you to review the presentations from Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf, and to dive into our library of resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/greenplum-summit-at-postgresconf-us-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]>, including:
- Greenplum Summit Presentations <[[https://content.pivotal.io/greenplum-summit-at-postgresconf-us-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - The sessions cover a breadth of topics from Greenplum co-founder Scott Yara’s keynote, to Greenplum for Postgres hackers, to a case study from Morgan Stanley and so much more. - Pivotal Greenplum 5: The Next-Generation Data Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-greenplum-5-the-next-generation-data-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - Learn more about the flexible deployment options, powerful SQL and programmatic analytics libraries, and seamless integration with different data sources/pipelines of Pivotal Greenplum in this whitepaper. - Data Warehousing with Greenplum: Open Source Massively Parallel Data Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - Explore the Greenplum approach to data analytics and data-driven decisions in this eBook produced in collaboration with O’Reilly Media. - Greenplum User Case Studies - Learn from our customers’ success:
- Conversant: Reinventing Digital Marketing with Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/conversant?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - GE Digital: Building the Platform for the Industrial Internet with Greenplum <[[https://content.pivotal.io/case-studies/ge-digital-case-study?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - China Railway: Scaling Online Sales for the Largest Railway in the World <[[https://content.pivotal.io/case-studies/china-railway-corporation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - Japan NICT: Greenplum for Extreme Weather Predictions and Analytics <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pjDSi1KGaDU]]>
- Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - This white paper talks about the power of a new generation of analytical databases. - Simplified Machine Learning, Text, and Graph Analytics with Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/may-24-simplified-machine-learning-text-and-graph-analytics-with-pivotal-greenplum-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-postgresconf-new-jersey-q218]]> - Attend our May 24 Greenplum webinar with 451 Research. - Greenplum YouTube Channel <[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIC2TGO-4xNSAJFCJXlJNwA?view_as=subscriber]]> - Learn about Greenplum by watching these educational videos.
Let's Stay Connected!
Continue the conversation with #DataTellsTheStory <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/DataTellsTheStory?src=hash]]> on Twitter, follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> for the latest news, and join the Greenplum Community <[[http://greenplum.org/]]> to be the first to know about new features and updates.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
